long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join the Fun!

Beshify Text Formatter is a handy Chrome extension designed to sprinkle fun and whimsy into your digital conversations. With just a simple right click, you can effortlessly transform your regular texts into beshified ones, inserting a ðŸ¤¸ emoji between each word.

Whether it's a comment on Facebook, a message in Gmail, or notes on a web-based document editor, Beshify can handle it. You have the flexibility to either format selected portions of text or, with no text selected, convert an entire text field at once, enhancing your digital communications in a fun and visually engaging way.

Beshify Text Formatter is perfect for those looking to add a dash of delight to their everyday digital interactions. So, whether you're looking to put a unique spin on your messages or simply want to make your friends smile, Beshify is the perfect tool for you. 

Enjoy beshifying your texts with a single click!
